Text:
Man, I think you have a mistake in your torrent details. It is not a movie by Fassbinder (the IMDB link seems to be correct).

Director: Ulli Lommel

Fassbinder acts in this movie, though : )
Lommel is a rotten director, I'm sure that Fassbinder is responsible for anything good about this film. Lommel's "Zombie Nation" is rated one of the worst movies ever at imdb.
